name: City Traffic Sniper
description: Are you ready to shoot criminals and gangsters in the city, with traffic going on with your best rifle and shooter gun? Because the people driving in the city need you. You are the best sniper shooter in this city traffic sniper shooter game. This is one of the best sniper shooting games in city traffic.There are terrorists, criminals and gangsters in the city, roaming in cars and vehicles. They are stealing other people 's cars and vehicles, to escape from the city. Use modern sniper equipment, powerful puncture bullets, powerful zoom functionality and elite special police sniper in this first person sniper shooter game. There are many other cars too in the city in this traffic with innocent people and passengers, you need to save them from robbers, gangsters and criminals roaming in cars in this city traffic with sniper shooting as a top sniper and fatal sniper with high-profile goals. It is a free fps sniper game like other action fighting games, sniper games, shooting games..
